content.question: Which of the following best describes a transform boundary?

choices.label: An area where two tectonic plates move away from each other
An area where two tectonic plates slide past one another
An area where two or more tectonic plates collide
An area where two or more tectonic plates fuse together at a suture zone

content.answer: An area where two tectonic plates slide past one another

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
